description.value: When you succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge]{Recall Knowledge} check, you learn an additional fact about the subject. When you critically succeed at a Recall Knowledge check, you can gain even more additional information or context than normal, at the GM's discretion.

rules.text: When you roll a success at a Recall Knowledge, you learn an additional fact. When you critically succed, you can gain even more additional information or context than normal.
